title: HLF SmartBFT Dashboard
description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Hyperledger Fabric networks using SmartBFT consensus algorithm. Tracks view changes, transaction processing, batch metrics, and pool performance.

__inputs.name: DS_PROMETHEUS
__inputs.label: Prometheus
__inputs.description: Prometheus data source for SmartBFT metrics
